docs.snippet: The University of Alabama-Birmingham men’s basketball team was left to wonder if a sharp drop in attendance was linked to the university’s decision to drop football....
docs.lead_paragraph: The University of Alabama-Birmingham men’s basketball team was left to wonder if a sharp drop in attendance was linked to the university’s decision to drop football.
docs.abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of The Times column notes that Alabama-Birmingham men's basketball team has had a good season, playing well enough to earn NCAA tournament berth, despite sharp decline in home attendance believed to be fallout from university's decision to drop football program.

headline.main: U.A.B. Moved Forward as Fan Support Slipped Away

docs.abstract: The Upshot; going for familiar bracket picks in NCAA men's basketball tournament may work but most experts agree that using clearheaded analysis when making predictions in financial markets is far better choice.
